title: Prevent mobile bottom nav from obscuring bottom-of-page content

requirements.summary: Adjust the AppShell <main> spacing on small screens so Outlet content can scroll above the fixed MobileBottomNav without being covered.
acceptanceCriteria: On mobile viewport widths (< md), the bottom-most content inside pages rendered via <Outlet /> is fully visible and can be scrolled above the fixed MobileBottomNav without being covered.
No layout regression on desktop (>= md): existing spacing and scroll behavior remains normal.
Change is applied only to the <main> element in AppShell.tsx (do not modify header, footer, or other layout components for this request).

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the existing <main> element (XPath /html/body/div/div/main) to add sufficient mobile-only bottom spacing (including safe-area inset consideration) so content rendered in <Outlet /> is not obscured by the fixed MobileBottomNav; preserve the current md+ spacing behavior.
